data.message:
The names Justin large I go by KidGrip I hope to hear back from you about any input you can give to further my career I'm from Ontario Hamilton to be exact and I'm looking for any help I can get I'm self driven motivated and dedicated to my music I'm hungry as an artist and would love a chance to be herd I feel like I have a talent that I thrive towards my speech is to power those around me. I specialize mainly in charity events and I take opportunities as I get them I really do hope to hear back from you as soon as possible
